title: Parametric Guitar: Fretboard Maker — Parameter Schema
description: Defines all user-facing parameters, their types, constraints, grouping, and defaults. This schema drives both the UI and the parameter bridge.

parameterMetadataFields.tooltip: string — helpful hint text shown on hover
parameterMetadataFields.category: string — custom categorization (count, dimension, angle, depth, spacing, etc.)
parameterMetadataFields.expert: boolean — if true, show in 'Advanced' section (default false)
parameterMetadataFields.dependsOn: array[string] — parameter names that should be set before this one
parameterMetadataFields.precision: number — decimal places to display in UI (0 = integer)

parameters.name: FretCount
parameters.label: Fret Count
parameters.description: The total number of frets
parameters.tooltip: Standard guitars typically have 20–24 frets; extended-range instruments up to 36.
parameters.notes: Affects fretboard length, heel transition, and fall-away configuration. | Expression: 24

parameters.name: StringCount
parameters.label: String Count
parameters.description: The total number of strings
parameters.tooltip: 6-string guitars are standard; 7–8 strings extend the lower range.
parameters.notes: Affects headstock tuning machine layout and bridge pin spacing. | Expression: 6

parameters.name: NeutralFret
parameters.label: Neutral Fret
parameters.description: The fret which is perpendicular to the fretboard's centerline when scale lengths aren't equal
parameters.tooltip: Only applies to multi-scale guitars. Set to 0 for single-scale designs.
parameters.notes: Typically 7–9 frets for most multi-scale designs. Affects fret spacing calculation. | Expression: 9

parameters.name: ScaleLengthBass
parameters.label: Scale Length Bass
parameters.description: Scale length for the top-most string of a multiscale guitar
parameters.tooltip: Low E string reference length. Standard is 25.5 in; 24.75 in is common for shorter scales.
parameters.notes: Determines fret spacing on bass side; critical for intonation. | Expression: 25.5 in

parameters.name: ScaleLengthTreb
parameters.label: Scale Length Treb
parameters.description: Scale length for the bottom-most string of a multiscale guitar
parameters.tooltip: High E string reference length. Set equal to Bass for single-scale; different for multi-scale.
parameters.notes: Only differs from Bass on multi-scale guitars. Affects treble-side fret spacing. | Expression: 24.25 in

parameters.name: GuitarLength
parameters.label: Guitar Length
parameters.description: Overall length of the guitar-- along the X-xis
parameters.tooltip: Total length from headstock tip to body bottom. Affects playability and neck comfort.
parameters.notes: Most acoustic guitars are 37–39 in; classical guitars 39–40 in. | Expression: 38.25 in

parameters.name: GuitarWidth
parameters.label: Guitar Width
parameters.description: Overall width of the guitar-- along the Y-axis
parameters.tooltip: Body width at the widest point. Affects comfortability and ergonomics.
parameters.notes: Standard dreadnought: 14.875 in; classical: 13–15 in. | Expression: 12.75 in

parameters.name: GuitarThickness
parameters.label: Guitar Thickness
parameters.description: Overall guitar thickness.
parameters.tooltip: Body depth from top to back plate. Influences tone and volume.
parameters.notes: Most acoustics: 2.75–3.5 in. Thicker = warmer tone, louder; thinner = brighter.

parameters.name: NeckThickness1st
parameters.label: Neck Thickness 1st
parameters.description: Neck thickness at the 1st fret.

parameters.name: NeckThickness12th
parameters.label: Neck Thickness 12th
parameters.description: Neck thickness at the 12th fret.

parameters.name: NeckLocation1st
parameters.label: Neck Location 1st
parameters.description: Neck width at the 1st fret (nut width).

parameters.name: NeckLocation12th
parameters.label: Neck Location 12th
parameters.description: Neck width at the 12th fret.

parameters.name: ScaleLengthSpacingBass
parameters.label: Scale Spacing Bass
parameters.description: Scale length spacing reference on bass side.
parameters.notes: Expression: if(( ScaleLengthBass == ScaleLengthTreb ); sqrt(( BridgeSpacing - NutSpacing ) ^ 2 / 4 + ScaleLengthBass ^ 2); ScaleLengthBass)

parameters.name: ScaleLengthSpacingTreb
parameters.label: Scale Spacing Treb
parameters.description: Scale length spacing reference on treble side.
parameters.notes: Expression: if(( ScaleLengthBass == ScaleLengthTreb ); sqrt(( BridgeSpacing - NutSpacing ) ^ 2 / 4 + ScaleLengthTreb ^ 2); ScaleLengthTreb)

parameters.name: FretboardThickness
parameters.label: Fretboard Thickness
parameters.description: Overall thickness of the fretboard-- along the Z-axis

parameters.name: FretboardLengthBass
parameters.label: FB Length Bass
parameters.description: This draws the length of the fretboard's bass-edge so that the heel will be neutral with the final fret

parameters.name: FretboardLengthTreb
parameters.label: FB Length Treb
parameters.description: This draws the length of the fretboard's treble-edge so that the heel will be neutral with the final fret

parameters.name: FretboardLengthBassRND
parameters.label: FB Length Bass RND
parameters.description: This rounds the overall vertical length of the fretboard's bass-edge to the nearest 1/8"

parameters.name: FretboardLengthTrebRND
parameters.label: FB Length Treb RND
parameters.description: This rounds the overall vertical length of the fretboard's treble-edge to the nearest 1/8"

parameters.name: FretSpacingBass
parameters.label: Fret Spacing Bass
parameters.description: The distance between the nut and the 1st fret intersection along the top-most string using "on-center" measurement. The length adjusts based on if the scale length is single or multi and accounts for the subtle difference between the two.
parameters.notes: Expression: if(( ScaleLengthBass == ScaleLengthTreb ); sqrt(( BridgeSpacing - NutSpacing ) ^ 2 / 4 + ScaleLengthBass ^ 2) * ( 1 - 1 / 2 ^ ( 1 / 12 ) ); ScaleLengthBass * ( 1 - 1 / 2 ^ ( 1 / 12 ) ))

parameters.name: FretSpacingTreb
parameters.label: Fret Spacing Treb
parameters.description: The distance between the nut and the 1st fret intersection along the bottom-most string using "on-center" measurement. The length adjusts based on if the scale length is single or multi and accounts for the subtle difference between the two.
parameters.notes: Expression: if(( ScaleLengthBass == ScaleLengthTreb ); sqrt(( BridgeSpacing - NutSpacing ) ^ 2 / 4 + ScaleLengthTreb ^ 2) * ( 1 - 1 / 2 ^ ( 1 / 12 ) ); ScaleLengthTreb * ( 1 - 1 / 2 ^ ( 1 / 12 ) ))

parameters.name: NeutralFretOffset
parameters.label: Neutral Fret Offset
parameters.description: This offsets the treble-edge of the fretboard to create the defined neutral fret

parameters.name: MarginNut
parameters.label: Margin Nut
parameters.description: The distance between the center of the bass string and the edge of the fretboard at the nut-end

parameters.name: MarginHeel
parameters.label: Margin Heel
parameters.description: The distance between the center of the bass string and the edge of the fretboard at the heel-end

parameters.name: SaddleSpacing
parameters.label: Saddle Spacing
parameters.description: Spacing between each saddle-- center-to-center

parameters.name: BridgeSpacing
parameters.label: Bridge Spacing
parameters.description: Spacing distance between the high and low strings at the bridge

parameters.name: FretboardExtension
parameters.label: FB Extension
parameters.description: Length of the material forward of the nut-edge of the fretboard toward the headstock

parameters.name: NutSlotSpacing
parameters.label: Nut Slot Spacing
parameters.description: Spacing between each slot on the nut-- center-to-center

parameters.name: NutSpacing
parameters.label: Nut Spacing
parameters.description: Spacing distance between the high and low strings at the nut

parameters.name: NutLength
parameters.label: Nut Length
parameters.description: Overall length of the nut-- along the Y-axis

parameters.name: NutWidth
parameters.label: Nut Width
parameters.description: Overall width of the nut-- along the X-axis

parameters.name: NutHeight
parameters.label: Nut Height
parameters.description: Overall height of the nut-- along the Z-axis

parameters.name: NutDepth
parameters.label: Nut Depth
parameters.description: The depth of which the nut slot must be cut

parameters.name: NutRadius
parameters.label: Nut Radius
parameters.description: Radius of the fretboard at the nut

parameters.name: BlindNut
parameters.label: Blind Nut
parameters.description: The distance from the edge of the fretboard to the end of the hidden tang

parameters.name: TangWidth
parameters.label: Tang Width
parameters.description: Width of the fret tang for the fret slot

parameters.name: TangDepth
parameters.label: Tang Depth
parameters.description: Depth of the fret tang for the fret slot

parameters.name: FretCrownWidth
parameters.label: Crown Width
parameters.description: Width of the crown of the fret

parameters.name: FretCrownHeight
parameters.label: Crown Height
parameters.description: Height of the crown of the fret

parameters.name: ZeroFretCrownWidth
parameters.label: Zero Fret Crown W
parameters.description: Width of the crown of the zero fret

parameters.name: ZeroFretCrownHeight
parameters.label: Zero Fret Crown H
parameters.description: Height of the crown of the zero fret

parameters.name: ZeroFretAdjust
parameters.label: Zero Fret Adjust
parameters.description: Adjustment at the nut-edge of the fretboard for a Zero Fret

parameters.name: HangFret
parameters.label: Hang Fret
parameters.description: This is a buffer for the frets to extend past the edges of the fretboard- 0 for Off, 1 for On

parameters.name: BlindFret
parameters.label: Blind Fret
parameters.description: The distance from the edge of the fretboard to the end of the hidden tang

parameters.name: FretMarkerDiaTop
parameters.label: Marker Dia Top
parameters.description: Diameter of the fret markers along the surface of the fretboard

parameters.name: FretMarkerDiaSide
parameters.label: Marker Dia Side
parameters.description: Diameter of the fret markers along the edge of the fretboard

parameters.name: FretMarkerDepth
parameters.label: Marker Depth
parameters.description: Depth of the fret markers from the surface of the fretboard

parameters.name: FretMarkerOctaveSpacing
parameters.label: Octave Spacing
parameters.description: The distance between the center points of the fret markers at the octaves

parameters.name: HeelExtension
parameters.label: Heel Extension
parameters.description: Length of the material beyond of the final fret of the fretboard toward the bridge

parameters.name: HeelTransitionFret
parameters.label: Heel Trans. Fret
parameters.description: Fret number where the heel transition begins.

parameters.name: HeelTransition
parameters.label: Heel Transition
parameters.description: Length of the heel transition zone.

parameters.name: HeelRadius
parameters.label: Heel Radius
parameters.description: Radius of the fretboard at the heel

parameters.name: HeelCurveRadius
parameters.label: Heel Curve Radius
parameters.description: Radius of the fretboard heel-edge curve

parameters.name: HeelFillet
parameters.label: Heel Fillet
parameters.description: Fillet radius for the fretboard heeledge corners

parameters.name: FretScallopWidth
parameters.label: Scallop Width
parameters.description: This value is the buffer from the edge of the scallop to the fret

parameters.name: FretScallopDepthBass
parameters.label: Scallop Depth Bass
parameters.description: Depth of the scallop cut on the bass edge

parameters.name: FretScallopDepthTreb
parameters.label: Scallop Depth Treb
parameters.description: Depth of the scallop cut on the treble edge

parameters.name: FretScallopFillet
parameters.label: Scallop Fillet
parameters.description: This fillet is used to help blend the scallop into the fretboard as desired

parameters.name: FallAwayFret
parameters.label: Fall-away Fret
parameters.description: At which fret the fallaway taper begings

parameters.name: FallAwayLength
parameters.label: Fall-away Length
parameters.description: The distance from the nut for the starting point of the falloff curve

parameters.name: FallAwayDepth
parameters.label: Fall-away Depth
parameters.description: The depth from the fretboard height at the heel-end which the taper terminates

parameters.name: HeadstockLength
parameters.label: Headstock Length
parameters.description: Overall length of the headstock-- along the X-axis

parameters.name: HeadstockWidth
parameters.label: Headstock Width
parameters.description: Overall width of the headstock-- along the Y-axis

parameters.name: HeadstockThickness
parameters.label: Headstock Thick.
parameters.description: Thickness of the headstock.

parameters.name: HeadstockEndSpacing
parameters.label: HS End Spacing
parameters.description: String spacing at the end of the headstock.

parameters.name: HeadstockEndAngle
parameters.label: HS End Angle
parameters.description: Angle of the headstock tip.

parameters.name: HeadstockAngle
parameters.label: Headstock Angle
parameters.description: Headstock back-angle.

parameters.name: HyoidDistance
parameters.label: Hyoid Distance
parameters.description: Distance between the nut and the hyoid of the headstock

parameters.name: HyoidBass
parameters.label: Hyoid Bass
parameters.description: Hyoid offset on the bass side.

parameters.name: HyoidTreb
parameters.label: Hyoid Treb
parameters.description: Hyoid offset on the treble side.

parameters.name: VoluteThickness
parameters.label: Volute Thickness
parameters.description: Thickness of the volute.
parameters.notes: Expression: if(( HeadstockAngle == 0 deg ); NeckThickness - FretboardThickness; NeckThickness + FretboardThickness)

parameters.name: BodyLength
parameters.label: Body Length
parameters.description: Overall length of the body-- along the X-axis

parameters.name: BodyWidth
parameters.label: Body Width
parameters.description: Overall width of the body-- along the Y-axis

parameters.name: BodyThickness
parameters.label: Body Thickness
parameters.description: Thickness of the guitar body.

parameters.name: BindingInset
parameters.label: Binding Inset
parameters.description: The distance inward to reduce the perimeter of the fretboard for applying a binding

parameters.name: BoutBottomAngle
parameters.label: Bout Bottom Angle
parameters.description: Angle of the bottom bout.

parameters.name: BoutWaistAngle
parameters.label: Bout Waist Angle
parameters.description: Angle of the waist bout.

parameters.name: BoutTopAngle
parameters.label: Bout Top Angle
parameters.description: Angle of the top bout.

parameters.name: BoutShoulderAngle
parameters.label: Bout Shoulder Angle
parameters.description: Angle of the shoulder bout.

parameters.name: BoutWidth1
parameters.label: Bout Width 1
parameters.description: Width of bout section 1.

parameters.name: BoutWidth2
parameters.label: Bout Width 2
parameters.description: Width of bout section 2 (waist).

parameters.name: BoutWidth3
parameters.label: Bout Width 3
parameters.description: Width of bout section 3 (upper).

parameters.name: BoutLength1
parameters.label: Bout Length 1
parameters.description: Length of bout section 1.

parameters.name: BoutLength2
parameters.label: Bout Length 2
parameters.description: Length of bout section 2.

parameters.name: BoutLength3
parameters.label: Bout Length 3
parameters.description: Length of bout section 3.

parameters.name: BoutLength4
parameters.label: Bout Length 4
parameters.description: Length of bout section 4.

parameters.name: StringGauge1
parameters.label: String Gauge 1
parameters.description: In standard tuning- typically your ' e ' string

parameters.name: StringGauge2
parameters.label: String Gauge 2
parameters.description: In standard tuning- typically your ' B ' string

parameters.name: StringGauge3
parameters.label: String Gauge 3
parameters.description: In standard tuning- typically your ' G ' string

parameters.name: StringGauge4
parameters.label: String Gauge 4
parameters.description: In standard tuning- typically your ' D ' string

parameters.name: StringGauge5
parameters.label: String Gauge 5
parameters.description: In standard tuning- typically your ' A ' string

parameters.name: StringGauge6
parameters.label: String Gauge 6
parameters.description: In standard tuning- typically your ' E ' string

parameters.name: StringGauge7
parameters.label: String Gauge 7
parameters.description: Reserved for 7-string guitar

parameters.name: StringGauge8
parameters.label: String Gauge 8
parameters.description: Reserved for 8-string guitar

parameters.name: StringAction
parameters.label: String Action
parameters.description: The clearance between the bottom of strings and the crown of the frets

parameters.name: StringEquispacing
parameters.label: String Equispacing
parameters.description: The equal distance between each string
parameters.notes: Expression: ( NutSpacing - StringGauge1 - StringGauge2 - StringGauge3 - StringGauge4 - StringGauge5 - StringGauge6 - StringGauge7 - StringGauge8 ) / StringCount
